text:
Company: Kirk Inc

Role: Regulatory Compliance Agency Attorney

Location: Remote (with occasional travel)

About Us:
Kirk Inc is a leading regulatory compliance consultancy, guiding businesses to meet legal standards with integrity and efficiency. With a diverse team of experts, we pride ourselves on fostering an inclusive work environment that values diverse perspectives and experiences.

Job Description:
We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Regulatory Compliance Agency Attorney to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in regulatory law, excellent written and verbal communication skills, and the ability to work collaboratively with stakeholders.

Responsibilities:
- Provide legal advice on regulatory compliance issues.
- Develop and implement compliance programs and policies.
- Conduct training and development sessions for clients and internal teams.
- Monitor changes in laws and regulations and communicate their impact.
- Assist in conflict resolution and dispute management.
- Represent clients in regulatory matters before agencies.

Qualifications:
- Juris Doctor (JD) degree from an accredited law school.
- Licensed to practice law in at least one jurisdiction.
- Minimum of 3 years of experience in regulatory compliance or a related field.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills required.
- Strong analytical and research skills.
- Experience in training and development is preferred.
- Candidates should have experience in conflict resolution.

Perks and Benefits:
- Competitive salary ranging from USD 80,000 to USD 120,000, based on experience and skills.
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Flexible work hours and remote work options.
- Professional development opportunities.
- Inclusive and diverse work environment.
